desc: Excellent balance of theory and practice provided by exceptionally well documented and visualized examples and code in Jupyter Notebooks that one can interact with to build intuition.
Andrew Ng is the best proctor for Machine Learning. The course has been perfectly balanced with thoritical as well as practical aspects. After this course I feel so confident. From ZERO to HERO
Professor Ng is so kind and nice. Slows down and explains step by step to make it easier to understand, and provides so many python program examples throughout the lecture.
This is one of the best course available out there. However the programming is little tough, though hints were there but providing some prerequisites would help better.
